properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 8:56PM CST until January 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS La Crosse WI
properties.description:
...Wintry Mix to Lead to Slick Roads on Wednesday...

.A wintry mix of freezing drizzle and light snow will lead to
slick roads along and south of Interstate 90 on Wednesday,
including during the morning commute. Untreated roads and
sidewalks, along with elevated surfaces such as bridges will be
especially vulnerable to icing. Plan now for potential travel
impacts, including slowdowns during the morning commute.

* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of
half an inch or less and ice accumulations of a light glaze.

* WHERE...Richland, Crawford, Vernon and Grant Counties.

* WHEN...From 6 AM to noon CST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY
